name: A. Joey Takes Money
statement:
Joey is low on money. His friend Chandler wants to lend Joey some money,
but can’t give him directly, as Joey is too proud of himself to accept
it. So, in order to trick him, Chandler asks Joey to play a game.In this
game, Chandler gives Joey an array a_1, a_2,
dots, a_n (n
geq 2) of positive integers (a_i
ge 1).Joey can perform the following operation on the array any number
of times: Take two indices i and j (1
le i < j
le n). Choose two x and y (x, y
ge 1) such that x
cdot y = a_i
cdot a_j. Replace a_i by x and a_j by y. In the end, Joey will get the
money equal to of elements of the final array. Find the maximum amount
of money
mathrm{ans} Joey can get 2022
cdot
mathrm{ans}. Why multiplied by 2022? Because we are never gonna see it
again!It is guaranteed that the product of all the elements of the array
a doesn’t exceed 10^{12}.
